description:
Having spent Christmas camping with her new friends, Rin Shima embarks on a solo-camping trip to see the New Year sunrise by the sea. All goes according to plan until unforeseen weather blocks the roads back home, making a return trip impossible. Rin, who is now stranded for a few days, is invited by Nadeshiko Kagamihara to stay at her grandmother's house.

What is supposed to be a two-day trip becomes an extended period of sightseeing and new experiences for Rin, and she encounters some new and old faces along the way.

(Source: MAL Rewrite)
synonyms: โลลิตั้งแคมป์ ภาค 2
แคมป์สบายสไตล์สาวๆ ภาค 2

tags.name: Outdoor Activities
tags.description: Centers around hiking, camping or other outdoor activities.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Camping
tags.description: Features the recreational activity of camping, either in a tent, vehicle, or simply sleeping outdoors.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Educational
tags.description: Primary aim is to educate the audience.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Motorcycles
tags.description: Prominently features the use of motorcycles.

alternative: リンの祖父 (Rin no Sofu; Rin's Grandfather)

node.description:
[Website](https://highkick.jp/tateyama)

He is a drummer for the Japanese rock band THE LINDA!, which was formed in 2002 when its members were enrolled at Rikkyo University.
Noriko Tsutsumiya is an animator who primarily does work for C-Station.

Musical score writer for GOTH and [STEINS;GATE](https://anilist.co/anime/9253/SteinsGate/), music producer for [Laid-back Camp](https://anilist.co/anime/98444/LaidBack-Camp/) , [CHAOS;CHILD](https://anilist.co/anime/21126/ChaosChild/), [Plastic Memories](https://anilist.co/anime/20872/Plastic-Memories/), and more.

[Twitter](https://x.com/jun_murakami) | [Website](https://jun-murakami.com/) | [Wiki](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/村上純_(音楽家%29)

Ryouji Maru founded Japanese animation studio [C-Station](https://anilist.co/studio/6074/CStation) in 2009 as an extension of [Bee Train Production](https://anilist.co/studio/5/Bee-Train) and is the company's current representative director.

__[Website](https://erisasaki.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/eri_lattice)__

__Eri Sasaki__ is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist and composer, who is signed to 5pb. Records and Sony Music Publishing. She made her music debut in 2015 with the release of her first single "Ring of Fortune", which is used as the opening theme to the anime television series Plastic Memories. She released her first album in 2017.

(Source: [Eri Sasaki's Official Website](https://erisasaki.net/profile), edited)

__[Website](http://asaka1007.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/asakaofficial)__

__Birthplace:__ Aichi Prefecture, Japan
__Hobbies & Special Skills:__ Watching Anime, Karaoke, Cosplay, Sleeping, English

__Asaka__ is a Japanese vocalist and translator.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/chiyomaru5pb)__ | __[Company Profile (MAGES)](http://mages.co.jp/about/company/)__

__Chiyomaru Shikura__ is a Japanese guitarist, novelist, voice actor, radio personality, moderator, animation planner, animation supervisor, music producer, composer, arranger and the representative director of 5pb./MAGES. 

Chiyomaru resigns as chairman and representative director of MAGES. on January 4th, 2023.

He has been the producer and lead animation planner for titles such as Chaos;Head, Steins;Gate, and Robotics;Notes. Shikura is also a very active composer and lyricist. To date, he has written over a hundred theme songs for the video games and anime adaptations he's worked on.

__[Website](http://asaka1007.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/asakaofficial)__

__Birthplace:__ Aichi Prefecture, Japan
__Hobbies & Special Skills:__ Watching Anime, Karaoke, Cosplay, Sleeping, English

__Asaka__ is a Japanese vocalist and translator.
